analysis.description:
HardcodedCrowdsale.preICOBuy (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f32087aa2474dd84ae973d216de2bc8669003ee.sol#234-257) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-managedTokenLedger.mint(_for,tokensBought) (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f32087aa2474dd84ae973d216de2bc8669003ee.sol#247-248)

HardcodedCrowdsale.refundPreICO (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f32087aa2474dd84ae973d216de2bc8669003ee.sol#266-278) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-managedTokenLedger.demint(msg.sender,tokenValue) (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f32087aa2474dd84ae973d216de2bc8669003ee.sol)

Reentrancy in HardcodedCrowdsale.preICOBuy (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f32087aa2474dd84ae973d216de2bc8669003ee.sol#234-257):
	External calls:
	- balanceOf(_for) == 0 (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f32087aa2474dd84ae973d216de2bc8669003ee.sol#246-247)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- preICOcontributors (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f32087aa2474dd84ae973d216de2bc8669003ee.sol#246-247)
